title: (x) "Nightly" square sans, similar to Simian - Armchair Modern {Mike Y}
content:
Hi! Can someone help me identify this font?

author: Landitus

comments.content:
Looks like it might be [Armchair Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20060603145920/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_armchair.html) from Psy/Ops.

- Mike Yanega
Looks like you might be correct, Mike. :^)
